item.title: How to Mod PS3
item.author: jlozada2426@protonmail.com (Jonathan Lozada De La Matta)
item.description: Modding the PS3 can get quite confusing because the directions are not straight forward or can be confusing if you have not done this before or spend time trying to understand how everything works. At first I was confused but, with trial & error I was able to get it modded and installed homebrew and multiman.
